questions.question: Scenario: While performing your duties, you encounter a situation related to cybersecurity fundamentals that may indicate a security risk. As a Level 1 decision-maker, what is the MOST appropriate action?
choices: Ignore the situation since no immediate impact is visible
Attempt to fix the issue independently without reporting
Report the issue using approved security or IT escalation channels
Wait to see if the issue escalates before responding
questions.answer: Report the issue using approved security or IT escalation channels
questions.info: This scenario-based question evaluates applied cybersecurity judgement at Level 1 difficulty consideration within cybersecurity fundamentals, focusing on risk recognition, escalation, and response.
